text.div:
This value set includes the following SNOMED CT "Severity" concepts:

  • 399166001: Fatal
  • 24484000: Severe
  • 6736007: Moderate
  • 255604002: Mild

name: Condition/Diagnosis Severity
description: Example value set for Condition/Diagnosis severity grading
